title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that lets you plug any Ollama-hosted model into LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template combining Ollama LLM with Sentence-Transformers embeddings and FAISS.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript bindings for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package; install with pip and control Ollama from Python scripts or notebooks.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an AI sidebar powered by any Ollama model for note-taking assistance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Community Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to Ollama’s API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI template that connects to Ollama and demonstrates streaming LLM responses.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver plugin that adds SQL query generation and explanation using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and posts replies.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated library of Modelfile recipes for community-tuned Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama and vision variants.
